post:
We are proud to announce our new High Performance Los Angeles SSD VPS plans.  
  
**Key Features**  
High End **Intel E5-2690v2** CPU ( Better than Linode's E5-2680v2 )  
Super Fast Hardware **RAID 10 SSD** Disk ( Much much better than DigitalOcean's RAID 5 )  
**Optimized Network** for North America, Asia, Europe and Middle East  
**2Gbps** Full Duplex Connectivity on Single Node  
XEN PV Technology, No Overselling 
  
**Our Offers**  
VSSD L1  
**768MB** Dedicated RAM  
1 CPU Core  
10GB SSD Disk  
1TB @ 100Mbps Premium Bandwidth  
**$6.95 per month**  
  
**Order link and more plans can be found at [our website](http://www.sugarhosts.com/vps/ssd-vps-hosting/?pk_campaign=let14810)**  
  
**Ping & Download Test**  
Hostname: us-lax.sugarhosts.com  
[10MB Test File](http://us-lax.sugarhosts.com/10MB-losangeles.bin) | [100MB Test File](http://us-lax.sugarhosts.com/100MB-losangeles.bin)  
  
**Available OS**  
CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian, ArchLinux, OpenSUSE, Gentoo, Slackware  
  
**Payment Methods**  
Credit Card, PayPal, Alipay & Bitcoin  
We accept USD, GBP, EUR, AUD, TWD and CNY(RMB) payments.   
Our website will detect your language and currency automatically.  
You can change currency when checkout.  
  
**5 - Star Customer Rating** - http://www.shopperapproved.com/reviews/sugarhosts.com/  

In case of any queries regarding any of the above plans, email us at sales [at] sugarhosts.com or submit a ticket [Here](https://www.sugarhosts.com/members/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3).

Thanks.
